actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to require the Foreign Claims Settlement Commission to reopen and redetermine the claim of Henry Gray against the Government of Poland, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Foreign Claims Settlement Commission to reopen and redetermine the claim of a named individual against the Government of Poland.

titles.title: A bill to require the Foreign Claims Settlement Commission to reopen and redetermine the claim of Henry Gray against the Government of Poland, and for other purposes.
